kv9.6:1.5: Hañci atītārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:1.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:2.3: Nanu atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:2.5: Hañci atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.5: Hañci anāgatārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:4.3: Nanu anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:4.5: Hañci anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:5.1: ☑ Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.3: Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.5: paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.7: Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.1: ☑ Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.3: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.1: ☑ Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.3: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:8.6: Hañci atītānāgataṃ natthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
